author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA STARTING TO ACCELERATE NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE BAHAMAS... ...DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE CONTINUING IN THE BAHAMAS THROUGH TONIGHT...
summary: ...MELISSA STARTING TO ACCELERATE NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE BAHAMAS... ...DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE CONTINUING IN THE BAHAMAS THROUGH TONIGHT... As of 5:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Melissa was located near 22.9, -74.8 with movement NE at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
